description:
Are you detail oriented and have a passion for crafting a high-quality dental prosthetics. Our renowned practice, with over 20 years in the community is looking for a talented Dental Lab Technician, who can work closely with our team of highly trained doctors. The ideal candidate will have 2-3 years experience in a dental laboratory, have expertise in dentures, implants and implant denture, and digital design.
Duties & Responsibilities:

 Scan, design, and mill crowns & implant abutments.
 Operate and maintain various dental milling machines and 3D printers.
 Previous experience in plaster and model work is an asset.
 Computer skills and hardware troubleshooting.
 Design, fabricate or repair dental devices.
 Attention to details and good communication skills.
 Quality control
 Education: College, CEGEP or other non-university certificate or diploma from a program of 1 year to 2 years
 Experience: 3-5 years or more

Requirements:
· Certified Dental Lab Technician
· Strong communication skills, time management, and case planning
· Proficient in fabricating implant dentures from start to finish
· A vast knowledge of dental anatomy, occlusion and the materials utilized in fabrication
We Offer:
· 30-40 hr work week
· Extended Health Benefits
· Competitive salary
· A collaborative work environment
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, PermanentPart-time hours: 30-40 per week
Benefits:

 Dental care
 Paid time off

Schedule:

 Monday to Friday

Ability to commute/relocate:

 Ontario: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)

Experience:

 dental technician: 3 years (required)

Work Location: In person
